biotools.summary:
The effects of multi-echo fMRI combination and rapid T2*-mapping on offline and real-time BOLD sensitivity.

Magnetic resonance imaging (MRI) data of the brains of 28 healthy volunteers, for the study and development of functional MRI methods.
